attributes.action: end to the so called bedroom Tax for all UK Citizens of five years or more
attributes.additional_details: I believe it is astonishing that the councils are actually enforcing evictions on long term residents for not being able to pay the scandalous Bedroom tax another one in our area has received eviction notices and expect thousands more though out the country. it is not the fault of people we are so over crowded  it is a Government and EU creation. the bedroom tax is monstrous and unacceptable to the people of the UK. a review or removal should be acted upon. anyone with Five years tenancy as a British Citizen should be except. or it should be removed
